nodes.bodyText: I'm wondering: why do we use inline styles here instead of a styled component?
matchData is passed down, but never used.
This will throw a console warning when empty or matches are true, since styled-components passes all props through: styled-components/styled-components#1198 (comment)
This throws a warning because the value of bsStyle can be a boolean and it is not the right prop type. We should replace && with a conditional operator.

Stream IDs should be strings instead of numbers.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                id: PropTypes.number,
          
          
            
                id: PropTypes.string,
Small thing: using an actual button here makes sense, but breaks the link alignment with text, since the browser will render it differently as a regular anchor:
